name: GENISYSLightingSystems
0:
”Alexa, open GENISYS Lighting”
”Alexa, ask genisys lighting to turn off the lights in the living room”
”Alexa, tell GENISYS Lighting to set the lights in my office to eighty at work”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: genisys lighting
des: Take control of your GENISYS lighting systems with voice commands using Alexa (Requires GENISYS CloudLink Application)
